mapper.update: update tb_class_professor set professor_no=#{professor_no} where class_no = #{class_no} order by class_no asc limit 1
mapper.select: select * from tb_class ORDER BY class_no asc limit 50;
select * from tb_class_professor where class_no=#{class_no} ORDER BY class_no asc limit 1

select * from tb_class where class_type like concat('%',#{class_type},'%') and credit like #{credit} and class_name like concat('%',#{class_name},'%') and department_no like concat('%',#{department_no},'%');

select count(*) from tb_class where class_type like concat('%',#{class_type},'%') and credit like #{credit} and class_name like concat('%',#{class_name},'%') and department_no like concat('%',#{department_no},'%');
mapper.update: update tb_class set nowcapacity=nowcapacity - 1 where class_no = #{class_no}
update tb_class set nowcapacity=nowcapacity + 1 where class_no = #{class_no}
mapper.delete: delete from tb_grade where class_no in (select class_no from tb_class where maxcapacity < nowcapacity) and term_no=#{term_no};
mapper.update: update tb_class set nowcapacity = maxcapacity-nowcapacity where class_no in (select class_no from (select class_no from tb_class where maxcapacity > nowcapacity) a);
mapper.select: select b.student_no,a.credit,c.nowcredit from tb_class a join tb_grade b on a.class_no=b.class_no join tb_student c on b.student_no=c.student_no where maxcapacity < nowcapacity and term_no=#{term_no}
mapper.update: update tb_student set nowcredit = nowcredit + #{credit} where student_no=#{student_no}
update tb_class set nowcapacity = maxcapacity - nowcapacity
update tb_student set nowcredit = maxcredit - nowcredit
mapper.select: select a.class_no,a.class_name,a.class_type,b.point from tb_class a join tb_grade b on a.class_no = b.class_no where term_no=#{term_no} and student_no=#{student_no}
select count(*) from tb_classreview where term_no=#{term_no} and student_no=#{student_no} and class_no=#{class_no}
select a.term_no,a.class_no,a.student_no,a.review,a.rating,b.student_name from tb_classreview a join tb_student b on a.student_no=b.student_no where class_no=#{class_no}
